content.question: Which of the following correctly ranks the internuclear distances for the <math alttext="H 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>H</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="C l 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>Cl</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="H C l" overflow="scroll"><mtext>HCl</mtext></math> molecules from shortest to longest?

choices.label: <math alttext="H 2 is less than C l 2, which is less than H C l" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>H</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>Cl</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mtext>HCl</mtext></math>

<math alttext="H 2 is less than H C l, which is less than C l 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>H</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mtext>HCl</mtext><mo><</mo><msub><mi>Cl</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="C l 2 is less than H C l, which is less than H 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>Cl</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mtext>HCl</mtext><mo><</mo><msub><mtext>H</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="C l 2 is less than H 2, which is less than H C l" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>Cl</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mtext>HCl</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="H 2 is less than H C l, which is less than C l 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>H</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mtext>HCl</mtext><mo><</mo><msub><mi>Cl</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>
